name: The Unimaginably Hard Life of a Potato
name_original: The Unimaginably Hard Life of a Potato
description:
This is a comedic platforming game in which you play as Tate, a potato. You will journey throughout instances and moments in his life, to help show how hard a potato's life really is. Since this is a prototype, it contains only two levels.

How to Play:

Use AD to move, Spacebar to jump

Left click to shoot potatoes at enemies

Credits:

Created By Noah Souser
